ontlr 1.0.0
  • Reference

Fetch paginated historical toll data from ANTT

Source: R/core.R
get_dataset.Rd

This function performs multiple requests to the ONTL public API to retrieve all records for a given year, automatically handling result pagination. Ideal for historical toll data analysis and transportation research projects.

get_dataset(
  year = 2000,
  dataset = "antt_pracaspedagio",
  column_order_by = "int_idapracaspedagio",
  column_filter_year = "int_ano"
)

Arguments

year

Reference year for data filtering (default: 2000)

dataset

Name of the dataset in the ONTL API (default: "antt_pracaspedagio")

column_order_by

Column name used for result ordering (default: "int_idapracaspedagio")

column_filter_year

Column name containing the year for filtering (default: "int_ano")

Value

A tibble containing all records found for the specified year

Note

- The function automatically handles pagination (100 records per page) - Process stops when an empty page is encountered - Consider error handling for potential network failures - Very old data (before 2000) may not be available

Warning

- Queries for years with large datasets may take several minutes - The function does not implement caching between executions - Ensure stable internet connection

See also

get_metadados For dataset structure information get_metadados_filterable_columns For available filterable columns

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Fetch toll data for 2023
df_2023 <- get_dataset(year = 2023)

# Fetch data with custom parameters
df_custom <- get_dataset(
  year = 2022,
  dataset = "antt_pracaspedagio",
  column_order_by = "int_idapracaspedagio"
)
} # }
